knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Files


```{r, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(magrittr)
x = list.files(pattern = "nii.gz")
y = c("lateral_ventricles" = "Lateral Ventricles", "seg" = "Tissue Segmentation", "structures" = "Brain Structures", "template_median" = "Voxel-wise Median", 
"template_sd" = "Voxel-wise Standard Deviation", "Template_to_MNIcomptx" = "SyN Transform to MNI space", 
"template" = "Template Image", "template_with_skull" = "Template with Skull",
"template_median_with_skull" = "Voxel-wise Median with Skull")
y = data.frame(name = y, stub = names(y), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df = data.frame(
  link = paste0("[", x, "](", x, ")"),
  stub = neurobase::nii.stub(x, bn = TRUE),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df = merge(df, y)
df$stub = NULL
df %>% 
  knitr::kable(escape = FALSE) %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling()
```
